name: Sweet Tooth (itch) (MeganMui)
description:
Created By: Megan Mui

Story: You play as a ghost who isn't exactly the best at doing its job. Due to not being able to scare trick-or-treaters, you decide to use a calmer method by asking people in order to earn your fill of candy. Be sure to avoid the nasty trick-or-treaters that come across!

Controls:

A- Moving left

D- Moving Right

W- Talking to residents when you reach a house.

S - Hiding in a bush to hide from enemies.

Have fun!
